caption.title:
Dynamics of the time-varying first-digit probability p
t .
caption.p:
Time-varying first-digit probability for digits 1 to 9 ( p 1, t , …, p 9, t ) are presented from top left to bottom right. The chart further includes the posterior mean (solid line) and 95% credible bands (shaded areas) of p
d, t , the sample empirical distribution (point), and Benford’s distribution (dashed line).
